name: ATM Challenge
description: This ATM simulator created in Ruby allows you to withdraw money or make a deposit after checking your credentials. Tested in Rspec

name: Library Challenge
description: A fully functional library developed in Ruby, where you can checkout and return books, as well as check the availability of titles that might be of interest. Tested in Rspec

name: Address Book
description: Create and save a contact app developed in JavaScript

name: Fizz Buzz
description: Childrens division teaching game developed in JavaScript

name: Rock Paper Scissors
description: Rock Paper Scissors game developed in JavaScript, using e2e training wheels for Unit and Acceptance Testing.

name: Slowfood
description: Online restaurant, created in Ruby on Rails, where you can order your favourite meals. Acceptance and unit testing using Rspec and Cucumber.
